# Home

This is a unofficial collection of the 2020/2021 race results for [TwinTowns Triathlon Club](http://www.twintownstriathlon.org.au){target="_blank"} based on the [club's webscorer page](https://www.webscorer.com/33755){target="_blank"}.

Results are presented in terms of overall participation and records ([example](#participation-total)), for each race ([example](#r-2021-02-13)), and for each competitor ([example](#a-Tracy-Foyster)).
